summary: POST /api/gamma-fine-tune endpoint fully tested - 12/12 tests passed. The endpoint optimizes antenna element lengths and positions for best gamma match SWR. All requirements verified: valid response structure, SWR improvement for detuned antennas, performance under 5 seconds for up to 20 elements, 2-element edge case handling, and near-perfect SWR detection.
critical_code_review_comments: gamma_fine_tune function uses fast analytical SWR estimator (_fast_gamma_swr) for ~100x speedup vs full design_gamma_match
Proper optimization priority: reflector length → driven position → dir1 position → driven length correction
Hardware output correctly varies by element count (2-element: 0.875/1.0 rod/tube, 8-element: 0.625/0.75)
Near-perfect SWR (<=1.02) detection implemented and working
All required response fields present: optimized_elements, original_swr, optimized_swr, feedpoint_impedance, optimization_steps, hardware
seed_data_creation: None - no seed data needed for this endpoint
context_for_next_testing_agent: POST /api/gamma-fine-tune endpoint fully tested with comprehensive test suite covering: detuned antenna optimization, performance requirements (all sizes <5s, typically ~0.12-0.14s), edge cases (2-element, near-perfect SWR), input validation, and hardware output. The frontend is an Expo React Native app - no browser testing applicable.

test_results.near_perfect_swr_detection: SWR 1.002 correctly detected as near-perfect, no changes made
